name: magyarkozlony-frontend
description: Magyar Közlöny - Official Hungarian Gazette Website

scripts.dev: npm run cache-bust && concurrently "npm run scss:watch" "node watch-and-bust.js" "npm run serve" --names "SCSS,BUST,VITE" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta,green"
scripts.build: npm run scss:build && npm run cache-bust && node build.js
scripts.force-refresh: npm run clean && npm run cache-bust && npm run scss:dev
